price: Na Sisi tukawadhalilishia. Basi baadhi yao wako wanao wapanda, na baadhi yao wanawala.
arabic: وَذَلَّلۡنَٰهَا لَهُمۡ فَمِنۡهَا رَكُوبُهُمۡ وَمِنۡهَا يَأۡكُلُونَ
footnotes: Na hao wanyama tumewafanya wawatumikie. Wengine basi wanawapanda, na wengine wanawala.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wadhallalnāhā lahum famin'hā rakūbuhum wamin'hā yakulūna
